questions.description: Are you confident about how much have you studied?
options: I'll put it to test with this App!

questions.description: Will you recommend this App to your friends?
options: No, I want them to fail the final exam! Muahahahaha

questions.description: What will you do if you find any bugs or have an awesome idea you'll love to see in this App?
options: I will just stop using the App
This app should have no bugs, I want my money back!
I will fork the repository, fix the bugs or implement new things and pull a request to you! <3
